result.reason: User requests a top-level 'Connections' menu mirroring the connection tree to allow access when the panel is hidden, saving screen space.
result.approach: Create a new 'Connections' menu in the main menu bar mirroring the connection tree structure. Populate it dynamically based on the current ConnectionTreeModel.
